INIT_PW_HINT.CUSTOMER: Se­cure the set­tings of your in­ver­t­er with a cus­tom­er pass­word.
INIT_PW_HINT.TECHNICIAN: Se­cure the product set­tings of your in­ver­t­er with a tech­ni­cian pass­word. This must be ac­cess­ible for trained per­son­nel only.

CHANGEUSER.LOGOUT_401: Ac­cess denied due to in­valid cre­den­tials. (401)

PASSWORD_RECOVERY.CHALLENGE_HINT: The pin for your pass­word re­cov­ery re­quest is:
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.REMAINING_SIGNATURE_CHECKS: Your re­main­ing sig­na­ture checks have ex­pired. Please gen­er­ate a new pin and for­ward it to your Froni­us Tech­nical Sup­port.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.TECHSUPPORT_HINT: Sys­tem own­ers may reset the cus­tom­er pass­word them­selves in Sol­ar.web un­der "Set­tings" / "Com­pon­ents". **Note for in­stallers only:** Use the "Re­cov­ery Key" func­tion in the Sol­ar.SOS portal ( ht­tps://sol­ar-sos.froni­us.com ) to re­ceive a Re­cov­ery Key.

CHANGEUSER.UNLOCKED_PROFI: You have suc­cess­fully un­lock­ed the coun­try setup set­tings.
CHANGEUSER.UNLOCKPROFI_HINT1: Enter the ac­cess code to un­lock the coun­try setup set­tings.
CHANGEUSER.UNLOCKPROFI_HINT2: In­cor­rect set­tings can cause mal­func­tions and fail­ures of the in­ver­t­er.
